titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for restraint of disorderly and vnnecessary resort to the court
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill ...,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at the court at White-Hall, the seuenteenth day of May, in the first yeere of His Maiesties reigne of Great Britaine, France and Ireland."--P. [2].
Contains plague precautions for meeting the Queen at summer progresses to Dover and elsewhere.--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
